title: lower priority que
body: since the recent downloads i have ha da problem in game, i find myself getting disconnected with server response errors requiring me to reload the game, its not my net everything else is running fine no issues. its not my provider or system. most recent game i had to reboot due to game just not loading properly in areas. i got the server response error again. I'm not behind a firewall. i managed to log back in and finish the game but got a 20 minute low priority cue. why is this? i was in the game when it finished i had cs and kills. now I'm being punished for something which is out of my control. after spending a small fortune on this game with champion and skins i don't feel that this is legit. how can a server error your end be my fault?

replies.body:
Hey there,

What was the exact error you received? Are you still experiencing problems?
